title: Where is the Google Pixel 1 November security update?
content:
Google wants to be like Apple, but where is the security update? Should have supported atleast 4 years. Paying so much money for a phone which is dropped after 3 years from Google itself is horrendous to say the least.
Google copies all "feature-removal innovations" from Apple and yet they can't copy a good thing like security updates.
And forget about support like Microsoft does. They give 10 year security updates to their OS.
